segments.text: What a typical kitchen scene, with the window open to the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden path and bushes through the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running full blast into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't she turned it off? The water's spilling everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good over there by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; she should be watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger; someone could slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe she's oblivious to all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
